public class RankAggregation
extends java.lang.Object

The RankAggregation combines multiple ranked lists into one.

rankAverage

private static java.util.List<java.util.List<WebResult>> rankAverage(java.util.List<java.util.List<WebResult>> lists)
Combine multiple ranked lists of WebResults to one ranked list, using the "Rank Average" algorithm described in "Search in Context", R.Kraft et al., WWW 2006.

Parameters:
lists - k ranked WebResult lists.
Returns:
A ranked list of WebResults.

adjustRanks

private static void adjustRanks(java.util.List<java.util.List<WebResult>> list)
Adjust WebResult.rank to their position in the ordered list.

Parameters:
list - - A Re-Ranked list of WebResults
